data.title: Kathryn (Kate) Wilhelm, P.E. on LinkedIn: #hiringnow #engineers
data.meta_description: Are you ready to take the next step in your career? Consider exploring our Baton Rouge engineering leadership opportunities.#hiringnow #engineers
data.text:
The ECI Group is hiring engineers and project management professionals. Join our Baton Rouge Design Team and shape the future with us with a rewarding career in the design polymer manufacturing and advanced recycling facilities globally! If you are a mid-career design engineer with 5 - 15 years of experience in design or project engineering let's talk. For more information about our current and future opportunities send your resume to kwilhelm@ecigrouponline.com or visit our website www.ecigrouponline.com. #nowhiring #mechanicalengineers #pipestressengineers #instrumentcontrolsengineers #processengineers #structuralengineers #pipingdesigners #projectengineers #projectmanagers

New Year New Opportunities at the ECI Group! If you are looking to advance your career to the next level review this week's Hot Jobs listed below or check our all our open vacancies on our our website at https://lnkd.in/giF6hd9j. #structuralengineering #chemicalengineering #nowhiring #engineeringleadership

Are you considering your next career move? We are actively recruiting mid-career and experienced engineering professionals in the Baton Rouge area interested in advancing and leading the design of Polyolefins and Advanced Recycling technologies globally. For more information on these and other career opportunities visit our website or forward your resume to kwilhelm@ecigrouponline.com. #nowhiring #structuralengineering #stressanalysis #mechanicalengineer #projectengineer #instrumentationengineer #

Are you considering a career change? Consider checking out this week's hot jobs here in the Baton Rouge. For more information feel free to contact me directly at kwilhelm@ecigrouponline.com or by phone at 985 264 6709 to learn more about these and other opportunities.

Consider Joining the ECI Team! We are actively recruiting Engineers at all levels! Below is a snapshot of this week's Hot Jobs in our Baton Rouge Office! * Sr. Instrument |Electrical Engineer * Piping Engineers – Materials|Stress Analysis [All Levels] * Project Controls Engineer|Scheduler * Sr. Mechanical Design Engineer|Fixed Equipment * Process Engineers [All Levels] * Mechanical Engineering Section Leader For more details call 985 264 6709 or send your resume to kwilhelm@ecigrouponline.com #mechanicalengineers; #chemicalengineers; #instrumentationengineers; #pipingengineers; #projectschedulers; #nowhiring

The ECI Group is looking for an experienced and knowledgeable Senior Process Engineer to supplement our existing team in our Manchester [Simon Carves Engineering] office to lead the process engineering activities related to an advanced recycling technology at a pilot plant and commercial plant scale. Consider joining our team of experienced process engineers leading a team of talented engineering professionals to developing process design solutions for our advanced recycling business line. https://lnkd.in/gV-BX39r If you have or know of a colleague who may have interest in learning more, please forward your resume to kwilhelm@ecigrouponline.com and we will schedule a time to discuss the opportunity further. Kate Senior Process Engineer|Advanced Recycled Plastics - Engineers and Constructors International Inc. - Career Page https://lnkd.in/gEyaMBEW • 1 min read Latest message #engineering #hiringnow #advancedrecycling #processengineering #pilotplant
